availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: William B. Martin (Warren County, Kentucky, clerk and Provisional Congress county commissioner (C.S.A))

body.p: Warren County, Kentucky, clerk and Provisional Congress county commissioner (C.S.A). Kentucky native. Clerk in Warren County, Kentucky in 1850. Referenced as “Old County Clerk” in Warren County, Kentucky in 1860. Elected as Provisional Congress commissioner of Warren County, Kentucky on December 11, 1861.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Warren County, District 1, p. 42.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Warren County, District 1, p. 847.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Warren County Marriages, Film 000242961, p. 592.
KYR-0004-033-0025.
